name: LD to Git
overview: Send LaunchDarkly flag changes to Git.
description: This integration sends LaunchDarkly audit log events to a git repository
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: API gateway endpoint for processing audit log.
formVariables.description: Updater Lambda endpoint where audit log would be forwarded

formVariables.name: LaunchDarkly API token
formVariables.description: Enter the API token generated from LaunchDarkly. Instructions for generating a [LaunchDarkly API token](https://docs.launchdarkly.com/home/account-security/api-access-tokens)

formVariables.name: Git repository URL
formVariables.description: Enter the URL for your target repository.

formVariables.name: Authentication token
formVariables.description: Enter the API token with access to git repository. For example, instructions for generating a [Github API Token](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token)

formVariables.name: Git branch name
formVariables.description: Enter the branch name for sending LaunchDarkly resources.

formVariables.name: Username
formVariables.description: Enter the user name for accessing your git repository. This is required if not using an API token

formVariables.name: Secret
formVariables.description: Enter the secret for accessing git repository. This is required if not using git api token
